properties.Name: AccountingFramework
properties.Description:
There are many different frameworks of accounting standards in use internationally. Each of these frameworks consists of a set of standards / rules / interpretations. Each accounting framework is controlled by their own governing body.

Ex:
GAAP
US GAAP
IFRS
FERC

Columns.Name: AccountingFrameworkId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Accounting Framework.

Columns.Name: AccountingFrameworkName
Columns.Description: The name of an Accounting Framework.

Columns.Name: AccountingFrameworkDescription
Columns.Description: The description of an Accounting Framework.

Columns.Name: GoverningPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.
